fields_of_interest: Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Trade, International co-operation and development, Customs, Employment and Social Affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Regional Policy, Trans-European Networks, Borders and Security
eu_initiatives: CEIPA follows European Directives and Regulations effecting the policy areas that are of interest. No topic of legitimate public concern, however uncomfortable, is off-limits. CEIPA currently focuses on three priorities – migration, climate-change and cross-border crime and terrorism
organisation_name: Centre for European and International Policy Action (CEIPA)
section: IV - Think tanks, research and academic institutions
goals__remit:
The Centre for European and International Policy Action (CEIPA) is a European and international Forum that provides governments, policy makers, the public and private sector, civil society, media and regional and international institutions with the tools and means to pursue European integration.  
CEIPA focuses on issues where the European Union is in need to develop new strategies.
relevant_communication: CEIPA regularly organizes debates, round tables and seminars. It advices governments, parliaments, NGOs, academic and public institutions on European policy issues. It helps the European Union institutions to find partners for implementing their policies. It advices public entities and NGOS on strategic project and programme development.
